Entry.name: A
Entry.value: Indicates Alternation between all Lower Levels

Entry.name: B
Entry.value: Price Application Hierarchy Rules Apply - Do Not Alternate between Levels

Entry.name: L
Entry.value: A rate with this element indicating an "L" value will be applied only in the absence of rate application by any with this element indicating "N" or "S"

Entry.name: N
Entry.value: A rate with this element indicating an "N" value will be applied to the exclusion of all other rates with this data element indicating other values

Entry.name: P
Entry.value: Only Applicable for Contracts - Indicates that Alternation between Levels applies to Contracts and Customer Specific Prices ("CT" and "PR") Only

Entry.name: S
Entry.value: A rate with this element indicating an "S" value will be applied to the exclusion of all other rates except those indicated as "N"
